definition.name: Application observability for AWS
definition.description: Support Agentic AI–driven performance investigation and resolution using live production telemetry.
definition.author: aws-actions

inputs.name: bot_name
inputs.description: The bot name to respond to in comments (e.g., @awsapm)

inputs.name: target_branch
inputs.description: The branch to merge PRs into (defaults to repository default branch)

inputs.name: branch_prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for branches created by the action (e.g., 'awsapm/', 'awsapm-')

inputs.name: allowed_non_write_users
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of GitHub usernames allowed to use this action even without write access. Empty string (default) means only users with write/admin access can use it.

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: GitHub token to use for API calls. If not provided, uses the default GitHub Actions token.

inputs.name: custom_prompt
inputs.description: Custom instructions to guide the AI agent's analysis and actions

inputs.name: cli_tool
inputs.description: CLI tool to use for investigation

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: Path to AI agent execution output file (used to post results back to GitHub). For claude_code path, pass this from claude-code-base-action outputs in a second call to this action.

inputs.name: output_status
inputs.description: Execution status from AI agent (success or failure). Only used when output_file is provided.

inputs.name: comment_id
inputs.description: GitHub comment ID to update with results (required for Step 3 - pass from Step 1 output: steps.prepare.outputs.awsapm_comment_id)

inputs.name: enable_cloudwatch_mcp
inputs.description: Enable CloudWatch MCP server for metrics, alarms, and log insights

inputs.name: test_mode
inputs.description: Enable integration test mode (internal use only)

outputs.name: prompt_file
outputs.description: Path to the generated prompt file for claude-code-base-action

outputs.name: mcp_config_file
outputs.description: Path to the MCP servers configuration JSON file

outputs.name: awsapm_comment_id
outputs.description: GitHub comment ID for tracking the investigation

outputs.name: branch_name
outputs.description: The branch created by Application observability for AWS Action for this execution

outputs.name: github_token
outputs.description: The GitHub token used by the action
